Generation VIII.Sword: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout—this move is known as Obstruct .
Generation VIII.Shield: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.

Generation VIII.Sword: Lake of Outrage Route 2 (only one), Bridge Field ( Wanderer ) Bridge Field , Dusty Bowl , Giant's Mirror , Stony Wilderness , West Lake Axewell ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Lake of Outrage Route 2 (only one), Bridge Field ( Wanderer ) Bridge Field , Dusty Bowl , Giant's Mirror , Stony Wilderness , West Lake Axewell ( Max Raid Battle )
